parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
The action that you want to specify for the rule. Valid values:

*   **1**: triggers alerts.
*   **2**: blocks escapes.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the rule. The name must be 1 to 80 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), forward slashes (/), periods (.), and underscores (\_). The names of rules that are created for the same user must be unique.

parameters.name: RuleTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the rule template. You can call the ListSystemClientRules operation to query the ID of the rule template.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: custom rule
*   **1**: system rule

parameters.name: SelectedPolicy
parameters.description: The check items that are enabled for the rule.

parameters.name: WhiteImages
parameters.description: The images that are added to the whitelist.
